r.d: Zip is an extension to create, modify and read zip files.
r.n: - compatibility with 8.3 - add new error macros (ER_DATA_LENGTH and ER_NOT_ALLOWED) with libzip >= 1.10.0 - add new archive global flags (ER_AFL_*) with libzip >= 1.10.0 - add ZipArchive::setArchiveFlag and ZipArchive::getArchiveFlag methods
